Adobe Customisation Wizard 9 Available

Aug 7, 2008 Aaron Parker

Adobe have made the Adobe Customisation Wizard 9 available for download for use with deploying Acrobat and Reader 9 applications.

Good news is that this allows you to disable the Adobe Product Improvement Program window that some people have been having trouble disabling. Iâ€™m now in the process of updating my post on deploying Adobe Reader 9.
